OptionalInputArgument.Name: Acceleration Factor
OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor used up to the Maximum value

OptionalInputArgument.Name: Start Value
OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Start value and direction. 0 for Auto, >0 for Long, <0 for Short

OptionalInputArgument.Name: Offset on Reverse
OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Percent offset added/removed to initial stop on short/long reversal

OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor initial value for the Long direction

OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor for the Long direction

OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor maximum value for the Long direction

OptionalInputArgument.Name: AF Init Short
OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor initial value for the Short direction

OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor for the Short direction

OptionalInputArgument.Name: AF Max Short
OptionalInputArgument.ShortDescription: Acceleration Factor maximum value for the Short direction
